column5: Hey OFC'rs,  Just had 2 quick questions....  1) I've fished before @  ROUGE RIVER (Found here on GOOGLE MAPS)  in SCARBOROUGH/PICKERING area; But I don't know WHERE TO FIND a BAIT SHOP in/around the area - Is anyone FAMILIAR with this area and know where I could find one? If so, what is the address or closest intersection?  2) Same question goes for  BLUFFERS PARK (Found here on GOOGLE MAPS)  in SCARBOROUGH... Anyone know where I can find a BAIT SHOP in/around that area?  Any information would be helpful... I'm trying to gather some information BEFORE ice-out!
Closest one to that area would be Rerries. Kingston Rd and Beechgrove Dr.
Are  THESE THE GUYS  your talking about?  Anyone know of any closer locations to either fishing spot?  Thanks SmallieFisher
thats the closest and only one around the area your asking about, theres a canadian tire just past the exit to the bluffs on kingston road for some items. cheers  ian
Live Bait can be bought at:  Lucky Tackle in Scarborough, corner of Midland and Shepherd.
